title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge Serverless testing: Accelerate development with Kiro (CNS427)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 增强无服务器测试：使用 Kiro 加速开发 (CNS427)
abstract: Struggling with serverless testing? The secret isn't just better tests - it's better architecture. In this interactive code talk, discover how GenAI transforms from a code generator to your architectural guide, accelerating serverless development through clean design patterns and strategic testing approaches. Through live demonstrations, you'll see how GenAI guides the evolution of Lambda functions to a testable architecture, generates maintainable test suites that scale across teams, and uses strategic insights to provide proactive architectural recommendations. Walk away with practical techniques to achieve faster test execution, test reliability, and architectural insights that prevent future technical debt.
abstract_cn: 在无服务器测试方面遇到困难？秘诀不仅仅是更好的测试——而是更好的架构。在这个交互式代码演讲中，探索GenAI如何从代码生成器转变为您的架构指南，通过清晰的设计模式和战略性测试方法加速无服务器开发。通过现场演示，您将看到GenAI如何指导Lambda函数向可测试架构的演进，生成可跨团队扩展的可维护测试套件，并使用战略洞察提供主动的架构建议。您将掌握实用技术，实现更快的测试执行、测试可靠性，以及防止未来技术债务的架构洞察。
